##How to Use "Car Compare"

### Radio Button
Select Manual or Automatic Transmission

### Use the Slider
To select the range of MPG you would like for the models you would like to compare

### Drop-Down List of Features
Use the drop down to select from the list of features you would to compare such as "cyl"
 for number of cylinders. The graph to the right with dynamically populate to compare the collection of cars in the "mtcars" dataset.
